text: Always Outnumbered is a 1998 television drama movie directed by Michael Apted and was based on the 1997 novel Always Outnumbered, Always Outgunned by Walter Mosley. It stars Laurence Fishburne, Bill Cobbs, Natalie Cole, Bill Duke, Cicely Tyson, Laurie Metcalf, Bill Nunn, Isaiah Washington, Danny Goldring. ==Other websites== * Category:1998 movies Category:1998 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Apted
title: Always Outnumbered
